dt: city in southwestern Asia northwest of the Dead Sea; divided 1948–67 between Jordan (old city) and Israel (new city); capital of Israel since 1950 and formerly the capital of the ancient kingdoms of Israel and Judah; old city under Israeli control since 1967 {it}population{/it} 765,000
Jerusalem is a holy city for Jews, Christians, and Muslims.

shortdef: city in southwestern Asia northwest of the Dead Sea; divided 1948—67 between Jordan (old city) and Israel (new city); capital of Israel since 1950 and formerly the capital of the ancient kingdoms of Israel and Judah; old city under Israeli control since 1967 population 765,000
